Unique Spell Rules

Source Pathfinder #144: Midwives to Death pg. 75

Inquisitor

Bleed Glory can be prepared as a 2nd-level spell
Steal Power can be prepared as a 4th-level spell

Other Rules

Source Pathfinder #144: Midwives to Death pg. 76
When casting bleed glory, mythic severance, steal power, or any other spell that specifically harms mythic creatures, the clerics, inquisitors, and oracles of Ongalte are treated as mythic sources for the purpose of resisting the spells' effects.

Ongalte can grant up to 8th-level spells.
